links.title: P&G slashes online ads while Facebook under fire for gender bias in its ads
links.description: P&G is slashing digital ad budget saying it's 'wasteful' and vows to disrupt the 'archaic Mad Men' model of advertising. While Facebook faces criticism of showing gender bias on its site where bare chested men are okay but bare backed women are a no-no. Yahoo Finance's Seana Smith, Andy Serwer, Ethan Wolff-Mann and Dion Rabouin discuss.

messages.body:
$AAPL 

I deposited my FAFSA check last week and bought a bunch of shares today. Can't wait till Monday to buy books and then some!
$AAPL Great summary of Saber Capital's 4Q17 letter -- long thesis for Apple: https://investoralmanac.com/2018/02/18/saber-capital-4q17-letter-2017-review-apple-and-tencent/

links.title: Saber Capital 4Q17 Letter: 2017 Review, Apple, and Tencent - InvestorAlmanac
links.description: Saber Capital Management Letter to Investors: 2017 Review, February 15, 2018 In 2017, portfolio gained 30.7% gross (25.3% net) vs. S&P 500 gain of 21.8% 3 biggest drivers were Apple, Verisign, and Tencent; gained 46%, 50%, and 114% respectively in 2017 Selling Too Early It was a mistake to sell our bank basket (JPM and BAC).

links.title: The Insidious Nature Of Investing Hindsight - See It Market
links.description: Many of my conversations with clients touch upon how they react to missing significant investment opportunities or selling profitable investments too soon. Most of you are no doubt familiar with the investing woulda-coulda-shouldas. Unfortunately, those opportunities or mistakes only become clear with the passage of time or the "benefit of hindsight."

links.title: Box (BOX) Q4 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Revenues Match
links.description: Box, Inc.'s BOX fiscal fourth-quarter 2018 adjusted loss was 6 cents per share, lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate. The loss was 54% narrower on a sequential basis and 40% narrower than the year-ago quarter and lower than the guided range.
